snippet.title: Space Vikings for the Apple II
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Part strategy, part simulation\action.

Your task is to capture planets and get loot from them, so you can pay your troops and get more.


What I think:

The strategy part is quite nice, but I don't like the simulation part...the framerate is just blargh...
